subtitle: words have a Triune form which exists
between the states of potential
resonance and writ these are expressed
as thought the spoken word and their
written forms
it could be said that these are the past
present and future states of the word
as previously stated our reality is
defined by the words that we use the
capacity to shape our lives and stand
firmly between the three great forces
depends on our relationship to words
if the focus of our communication is
making words sound beautiful alone and
not preserving the Integrity of the
truth being communicated then words may
lose all meaning
our words must be clearly defined as to
accurately reveal their underlying
intention a flowery word though
Beautiful May paint an unclear picture
that which is vague May often pose the
greatest threat to truth
foreign
